summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.0°C), feels like temperature (down 2.0°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (down 185 m), and light levels (down 7566 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 99.2m higher than yesterday, 185.0m higher than past week, 204.2m higher than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 425m to a maximum of 1526m, averaging 1052.3m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 867.3m and 848.0m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.
